9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Najiyah Al-Khuza'i (the Companion of the Messenger of Allah) said:"I said: 'O Messenger of Allah! What should be done with the afflicted among the Hadi?' He said: 'Slaughter them, then dip their sandals in their blood, then leave them so that the people can eat them

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ إِذَا عَطِبَ الْهَدْىُ مَا يُصْنَعُ بِهِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About What Is Done With The Hadi When It Is Afflicted
